name: Helix Blast 3D
description:
Warning, invaders are coming!
They are rushing to you, however you don't have a gun!
Use your shield to smash them!

GAME FEATURES:
- Simple to play, but to be a master? You need to practice more!
- Time killing, relax you mind!
- All kinds of weapons!
- Protect your core from enemies!

HOW TO PLAY:
You can just use one finger to control your ship, use the shield to smash those enemies.
Upgrade your ship and weapons can make you more powerful!
